title: Top Companies for Innovation; Amazon, Microsoft and IBM lead this list from the Management Top 250 ranking
text:
Amazon scored 155 for innovation, with Microsoft next at 136.2 and then IBM at 115.6. Microsoft is No. 1 in the overall ranking, with Amazon second overall and IBM fourth. Apple Inc., fourth in innovation, is No. 3 overall. Johnson & Johnson and Intel Corp. also made the top 10 both for innovation and overall.

Intel is one of eight All-Starsin the latest ranking—companies that excelled in all five components of the overall ranking. Equinix Inc., No. 5 for innovation, posted the biggest gain in overall score of any company in the Management Top 250, with the biggest increase in its component scores coming in innovation.

Other top-10 component scores for the companies in the innovation top 10 include Amazon for financial strength, Microsoft for employee engagement and development, financial strength and social responsibility, IBM for customer satisfaction, Apple for financial strength, and Intel Corp. for social responsibility.

You can explore the full, detailed rankings here. In the coming weeks we'll take a look at the leaders in social responsibility and financial strength and the companies whose innovation scores improved the most from the previous year.

—Gerard Yates
